txtnamedescription: Hello! My name is Daniel and I am a Full-Stack developer. Finished my studies at College Lasalle in Montréal, compeleted an internship and currently working full-time since 2016. Very enthusiastic about programming, I work on different projects at home to improve my skills, knowledge and learn new stuff. I enjoy watching movies, playing video games and listening to music on my spare time. That was a quick summary of myself, maybe you want to work together? Let me know, Cheers!
Salut! Je m'appelle Daniel et je suis développeur Full-Stack. J'ai terminé mes études au Collège Lasalle à Montréal, j'ai completé un stage et je travaille actuellement à temps plein depuis 2016.
Привет! Меня зовут Данила. Закончил колледж Ласаль в городе Монреаль, затем завершил стажировку и с 2016 года работаю программистом.
